attributes.review: do not get this app! it wiped ALL of my data from my other apps and had so many technical problems! it continuously glitches and forced my phone into a three day long shutdown!! when i turned it back on, this app was the only one i could use!!!! all apps matter! not just this one!
attributes.title: ALL APPS MATTER!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it immediately started lagging and freezing up on me. I had to turn my phone off and on multiple to get it to work for just a few minutes and then it stopped working again. Waste of my time and shouldn’t be on the App Store.
attributes.title: Unusable

attributes.review: It’s absolutely trash as soon as I opened it it made me click off of the answer app and i tried to get on other apps and it wouldn’t let me then all of a sudden my phone was glitching terribly the only reason why it’s on now is because I had to get a whole new phone 😡😡
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I decided to try this app a try after I got into a argument with my black neighbor so I was like hey my homophobic racist president will cheer me up. IT TOOK A YEAR TO DOWNLOAD plus I got a call stating to undownloaded because I’m not apart of they’re agenda I asked what did they mean they told me I’m to “tan” for them. Just because I’m black don’t mean I’m black. Joe Biden for president pleaseeee.
attributes.title: Why even try

attributes.review: the first night at BED when you left, Ron made out with two girls and put his head between a cocktail waitress's breasts. [He] also was grinding with multiple fat women. When you left crying at Klutch, Ron was holding hands and dancing with a female and took down her number. Multiple people in the house know, therefore you should know the truth.
attributes.title: sam

attributes.review: So when I downloaded it IT TOOK OVER A WEEK TO DOWNLOAD so when it finally downloaded it asked for personal questions such as “What’s your phone number” and more I felt really uncomfortable that an app like this would as for my number THEN it made my phone glitch a lot and I couldent use my phone FOR A WEEK so this app is terrible
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: Took forever to download. When I finally got it downloaded it took forever to load and didn’t want to open half the time. When I got it open all I saw was racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, misogynistic crap. Along with a orange faces old man. I would not recommend downloading this app. Don’t waste your time here.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I was so excited for Trumps 2020 campaign as he has helped me find a supportive community amidst living with my heterophobic LESBIAN parents (I know disgusting). Come to find out that Trump’s running mate is a flaming homosexual! He’s probably made passes at every man in the Oval Office...even my tangerine prince😭. Trump be stern with the gays like Leviticus says and you’ll have my trust back.
attributes.title: I Feel Betrayed

attributes.review: This app is the worst app i’ve ever used. I created an account and it completely wiped my phone and stole all my data. My phone is slow and lagging due to this app. Takes forever to load and not to mention, racist, misogynistic, homophobic, transphobic, and basically against anyone who isn’t a white male in america <3.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!! Do NOT download.

attributes.review: You don’t need to download this. It starts out asking you if it can bombard you with notifications! Absolutely not! I don’t want Trump telling me what to do! Then it asks you for your PERSONAL PHONE NUMBER! I don’t want to give my number to my racist homophobic snowflake of a president...... sorry. But anyways... don’t download this it made my iPad work slow.
attributes.title: Wow.....
